    Adapter class for displaying a list of events in a RecyclerView for administrative purposes.

    Adapter class for displaying a list of user profiles in a RecyclerView for administrative purposes.

    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a user item is clicked.

    ViewHolder class that holds the views for displaying a user's profile in the RecyclerView.

    Adapter class for displaying a list of available events in a RecyclerView on the home screen.
    AvailableEventsAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class that holds the views for displaying an event's details in the RecyclerView.
    DeadlineWorker
    DeadlineWorker is a background worker responsible for checking event deadlines and moving users from the "Selected" entrant list to the "Cancelled" entrant list in Firebase Firestore if the deadline has passed.
    EntrantListAdapter
    EntrantListAdapter manages the display of a list of entrants in a RecyclerView.
    EntrantListAdapter.EntrantViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for each entrant item in the RecyclerView.
    EventController
    Controller for handling event-related operations in Firestore, including event creation, updating, fetching, and entrant list management.
    EventController.EventCallback
    Callback interface for event-related operations to communicate results back to the calling class.
    EventController.ImageUpdateCallback
    Callback interface for image update operations, to indicate completion status.
    EventImageAdapter
    Adapter for displaying a list of event images in a RecyclerView.
    EventImageAdapter.ImageViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for each image item in the RecyclerView.
    EventsPagerAdapter
    Adapter for providing fragments to a ViewPager2.
    EventStatusAdapter
    Adapter for displaying a list of event statuses in a RecyclerView.
    EventStatusAdapter.StatusCallback
    Callback interface for fetching the status of an event.
    EventStatusAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder for holding and recycling event item views.
    FacilityAdapter
    FacilityAdapter manages the display of a list of facilities in a RecyclerView.

    ViewHolder class for each facility item in the RecyclerView.
    FacilityController
    Controller for handling facility-related operations in Firestore.
    FacilityController.FacilityCallback
    Callback interface for facility-related operations to communicate results back to the calling class.
    ImageController
    Controller class for handling image operations in Firebase Storage.
    ImageController.ImageDeleteCallback

    ImageController.ImageRetrieveCallback

    MyFirebaseMessagingService
    MyFirebaseMessagingService is a service that extends FirebaseMessagingService to handle incoming Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) messages.
    NotificationAdapter
    Adapter for managing and displaying notifications in a RecyclerView.
    NotificationService
    Service class for managing notifications and storing them in Firebase Firestore.
    ProfileImageController

    SwipeRefreshHelper
